alert.note: Alert for Custer County Plains; Pine Ridge Area (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 18 at 1:59PM MDT until September 19 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: .Unseasonably warm temperatures are expected Monday. With very dry air in place, minimum relative humidities will drop below 15 percent for portions of northeast Wyoming and southwest South Dakota and range from 15 to 25 percent for the remainder of western South Dakota. Wind gusts of 20 to 35 mph are expected for portions of northeast Wyoming and southwest South Dakota Monday afternoon. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT MONDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 325 AND 326... The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM MDT Monday. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 325 Custer County Plains and 326 Pine Ridge Area. * WINDS...West to southwest 10 to 20 mph with frequent gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity would produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Custer County Plains; Pine Ridge Area
